name: Today | Task Manager | Notion
description: ◻︎ Today is about simplicity✓ And completing tasks✓ With help of a Notion templateWhy did I create this?There's no trick to getting things done but having the right system. A lesson from Atomic Habits, “You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your system.”New tasks, projects, and ideas come up every day. Not having a system to organize all of them can distract you from your real priorities and deadlines.Today is a smart & simple task list Notion template to help
features: Capture your thoughts quickly to your Tasks Database; Classify your tasks by area or project; Manage your task status, deadline, attachments and references; Organize tasks by multiple filters such as deadlines, priorities, and contexts; View your upcoming deadlines in a weekly calendar view; Drag and drop to customize different layouts and views; Tasks database; Today / Overdue section; Upcoming Week Section; Upcoming Month Section
